avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs may form during snow showers on Sunday but on Monday night warming and rain is expected to melt snow in the lowlands.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Wind slabs may form in the mountains on norhterly and easterly aspects during strong winds and snow showers on Sunday. Warming on Monday night and rain is expected to melt snow in the lowlands and may reach mountain elevations. Older snow is stable.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slab formation and southwest snow showers are expected in most regions except for East Iceland on Monday night.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slab formation and southwest snow showers are expected in most regions except for East Iceland on Monday night.

weatherForecast.highlights: Búist er við éljagangi aðfaranótt mánudags og fram á kvöld þegar hlýnar með töluverðri rigningu um allt svæðið. Á þriðjudagsmorgun kólnar síðan aftur með suðvestan éljum.

avalancheActivity.comment: Small sluffs in Kirkjubólshlíð on Sunday March 2nd.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New wind slabs can be expected in mountains due to snowfall and snowdrift from variable southerly winds.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has added and drifted in E-S-W winds in recent days. Before, there was relatively little snow, with old stiff and stable snow in mountains.  Continuing snow showers and snowdrift from variable E-S-W winds are forecast for the next few days. Wind slabs are expected to continue to build up in mountains, especially in slopes with northerly aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slab formation and southwest snow showers are expected in most regions except for East Iceland on Monday night.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slab formation and southwest snow showers are expected in most regions except for East Iceland on Monday night.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snjókoma í SV og V átt aðfaranótt mánudags. Úrkomuminna á mánudag en fer svo að snjóa í austanátt um kvöldið, með rigningu/slyddu á láglendi. SV él á þriðjudag. Rigning eða slydda á láglendi á miðvikudagskvöld, austanátt.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Some of the new snow has melted again at lower elevations, but wind slabs may form in the mountains due to snow showers on Sunday and Monday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Some melting has occurred again at lower elevations after snowfall earlier in the week and warming on Saturday night. Wind slab formation is expected in the mountains due to snow showers on Sunday and Monday. Older snow is considered stable.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slab formation and southwest snow showers are expected in most regions except for East Iceland on Monday night.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slab formation and southwest snow showers are expected in most regions except for East Iceland on Monday night.

weatherForecast.highlights: Á sunnudagskvöld og fram undir mánudagsmorgun má búast við suðvestan-éljagangi. Aðfaranótt þriðjudags snýr í suðaustanáttir með samfelldri snjókomu í landshlutanum til morguns.

avalancheActivity.comment: A small loose snow avalanche released in Magnúsartindur in Oddsskarð on February 26. Several thin avalanches fell in Seldalur and Fannardalur near Norðfjörður on the morning of February 22.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The older snowpack is generally considered stable. Snowfall the night before Tuesday can form thin wind slabs in mountains.

snowpackStructure.highlights: The older snow is hard and stable, with little snow in lowlands. Some recent snow is present high in the mountains, where wind slabs may have formed. Snowfall on Monday night may add form thin new wind slabs in mountains. They could become unstable in sunshine on Tuesday.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slab formation and southwest snow showers are expected in most regions except for East Iceland on Monday night.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slab formation and southwest snow showers are expected in most regions except for East Iceland on Monday night.

weatherForecast.highlights: Úrkomulítið á mánudag. Snjókoma í fremur hægri austanátt aðfaranótt þriðjudags, hlýnar undir morgun með rigningu á láglendi og svo snýst í vestanátt. Bjart á þriðjudag og þurrt þar til fer að snjóa eða slydda seinnipart miðvikudags. Hiti í kringum frostmark.
